app_subtitle: Build download list in web, download with yt-dlp
introduction_section:
## ðŸ“šðŸŽ§âš¡ Quick & Easy Audiobook Downloads

Downloading audiobooks from YouTube and adding metadata like title, author, chapters, and cover art takes time. This browser-based tool prepares a list of YouTube video links and book details, then generates a script that handles everything automatically.

For each video link, you enter book information: title, author, narrator, series, and year. The app generates a script that uses `yt-dlp` to **download the video and extract the audio**. Then `ffmpeg` embeds the metadata, adds chapter markers (if available), and incorporates cover art into the audio files.

Everything runs in your browser - your data stays on your computer. Run the generated script in your terminal to download and process the audiobooks.
book_card_book_title_helper: Example: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
book_card_narrator_helper: Person who reads the audiobook (e.g., Jim Dale)
book_card_series_helper: Name of the book series (e.g., Harry Potter)
metadata_dialog_description: The fetched metadata differs from your current data. Please select which values to keep:
settings_cookies_browser_helper: Attach cookies from your browser to bypass 403 errors and access non-public videos.
script_generation_warning_text: **Warning:** You need to have [yt-dlp](https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp) and [ffmpeg](https://ffmpeg.org/) installed in order for the script to work.
script_generation_error_no_books: Please add at least one book with URL, title and author.
script_generation_error_copy_failed: Failed to copy to clipboard. Please try again.
script_generation_error_invalid_books: Books list is invalid. Fill all required fields first.
csv_dialog_description: Select a CSV file to import. Make sure the columns match the expected format: YouTube URL, Book Title, Author, Narrator, Series Name, Series #, Year
footer_copyright: Â© {year} YouTube Audiobook Download Helper. All rights reserved.
footer_disclaimer: This tool is provided as-is. Use at your own risk. Always respect copyright and YouTube's terms of service and your mom.
validation_url_invalid: URL must be a valid YouTube URL
validation_series_number_min: Series number must be at least 1
